partial_progress.details: Refactored buildFamilyFromSeed to use dovetailChainSet from DovetailingChain.lean. Same-sign temporal coherence now proven via existing lemmas. Remaining sorries: 2 cross-sign architectural (lines 246, 256) + 3 seed-related infrastructure (lines 161, 328, 337).

completion_data.completion_summary: Reduced SeedCompletion.lean from 10 to 5 sorries by integrating with DovetailingChain.lean. Same-sign temporal coherence (forward_G for t>=0, backward_H for t<0) now uses proven dovetailChainSet lemmas. Remaining 5 sorries are architectural cross-sign issues shared with DovetailingChain.
